title: Players interested in ARAM
body:
I promote 0ZRAM an ever growing Australian ARAM clan of 50+ members 
We are always looking for more ARAM enthusiasts to join our ranks

We have a clan discord
Clan members play together daily 

EDIT: I have also linked up with the other largest ARAM guilds within OCE server and all often play together.  We are also in the midst of hopefully organizing some future ARAM tournaments between clans

Thanks all I'll see you on the bridge
